scripts.start: npm run setEnv debug && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
scripts.prod: npm run setEnv production && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
scripts.test: npm run setEnv debug && jest || true
scripts.postinstall: react-native link && react-native link react-native-svg && node ./scripts/generateConfigFiles.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && watchman watch-del-all && npm install
scripts.bundle: npm run setEnv production && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.bundleDebug: npm run setEnv debug && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.installAndroid: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && react-native run-android
scripts.reinstallAndroid: npm run clean && npm run installAndroid
